__e: Now, ma'am, I'm a friendly guy... and I want to help you.
Unless he was friendly, which, considering who we are and what we do, probably not.
I was only trying to be friendly and-- what do you mean "on you," like I'm a hairless cat or something?
I'm sure you're very friendly with all the ladies.
Apparently, they were a bit too friendly with his daughters, and Daniel decided to take matters into his own hands.
Oh, it certainly wasn't friendly to us!
